channel.title: Jim Likes Games Virtual Booth at Gauntlet Open Gaming!
channel.description:
Hey, folks!
Just wanted to take a moment to announce that The Gauntlet has agreed to set me up as the official Virtual Vendor for Gauntlet Open Gaming Weekend!
I'll have a channel on the Discord (#jim-likes-games-virtual-booth) where I can answer questions about stock, show off my tiny little office, and maybe even show your order packed in real time!
Place orders directly through the web site: https://jimlikesgames.com/
Every order over $50 will include a FREE Gauntlet pin OR keychain (both if you go in for $100), your choice.
The Gauntlet has also purchased TWO $50 gift certificates to the store! ONE will be randomly awarded to an OGW attendee who drops into the Discord thread and tells me what THEY like in the following format: "NAME likes THING (or person, place, whatever)." Contest runs from the official start of the con through the end. I'll contact the winner afterwards.
The OTHER $50 Gift certificate will be awarded randomly to one lucky customer who makes any confirmed paid purchase during OGW. Again, I'll let you know after the show, so you can use the GC right away to include in your shipment, or save for a later date. Thanks to the Gauntlet for sponsoring this giveaway!
[![](https://images-ext-1.discordapp.net/external/EelUHnGHsN4K1W3iN0_Kz7-3QP3rJERt_bZMHqzcn4w/%3Fv%3D1532839394/https/cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0016/8964/9254/files/IMG_8154_1200x1200.jpg?width=300&height=300)](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0016/8964/9254/files/IMG_8154_1200x1200.jpg?v=1532839394)

item.title: Jim Likes Games Virtual Booth at Gauntlet Open Gaming!

item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

Well … The Gauntlet likes games too …
